text: Gabriele Pontangeli (died 1478) was a Roman Catholic prelate who served as Bishop of Lettere-Gragnano (1455–1478). ==Biography== On 30 January 1455, Gabriele Pontangeli was appointed during the papacy of Pope Nicholas V as Bishop of Lettere-Gragnano. He served as Bishop of Lettere-Gragnano until his death in 1478. == References == ==External links and additional sources== * (for Chronology of Bishops) * (for Chronology of Bishops) Category:15th- century Roman Catholic bishops Category:Bishops appointed by Pope Nicholas V Category:1478 deaths
title: Gabriele Pontangeli
